ChemPlot: A python library for chemical space visualizationÂ¶

In the last decades, Machine Learning (ML) applications have had a great impact on molecular and material science. However, every ML model requires a definition of its applicability domain. We developed a python package, Chemplot, that allows users to plot the chemical space of their datasets. Chemplot contains smart algorithms behind which uses both structural and tailored similarity. Moreover, it is easy to use even for non-experts.

This guide provides the user with the explanantion of ChemPlot concepts and functionality.
